Title: Face Lift
Plot: In an apparent interrupted burglary, a body is found in a pottery store. Sara and Warrick investigate the case of a woman mysteriously burned to death in her home.
GuestStars: Brigid Brannagh, James Eckhouse, Joan McMurtrey, Larry Holden, Brian Howe, Tom Gallop, Reginald VelJohnson, Skip O'Brien, James Wellington, Greg Collins, Teddy Lane Jr., Kathy Christopherson, Craig Woolson
